about_the_game:
Game Overview

"System Malfunction" is a first-person horror game set in a mysterious building.
The player takes on the role of a security guard who witnesses strange occurrences during the night shift.
In a fear-inducing environment, the player explores the building to uncover hidden truths.

Story

You are a new security guard assigned to the night shift.
While performing your duties, you become entangled in bizarre events occurring within the building.
What happened in this building in the past, and why are these strange phenomena happening now?
Can you unravel the mystery?

Controls

Movement: WASD keys
Inspect: Left-click
Pause: ESC key

System

Save System: The game automatically saves at the end of each chapter.
Endings: There are four different endings, determined by the player's choices.
Playtime
The average playtime for this game is between 40 to 60 minutes, varying based on the ending and the depth of exploration.

Video Streaming Guidelines

Permission to Stream: Streaming is allowed without any prior permission for both individuals and organizations.
Monetization: Monetization is allowed only if the platform's features are used.
Disclaimer: We take no responsibility for any damages resulting from streaming videos of this game.
Possible Changes: These guidelines are subject to change without notice.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+ x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 or AMD Radeon RX 460
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10600 / AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070 or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
